mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_user (user_id, user_password, user_email, user_gender, user_age, profile_image) Values (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail} ,#{userGender}, #{userAge}, #{profileImage} )
mapper.select: select user_num, user_id, user_password, user_email, user_gender , user_age, profile_image, user_point, user_grade from m_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT r.rate_num, r.user_num, r.movie_num, r.rate_review, r.rate_date, r.rate_score, r.rate_like, m.movie_title FROM m_rate r JOIN m_movie m ON r.movie_num = m.movie_num WHERE r.user_num = #{userNum};

SELECT mu.user_num, mu.user_id, mu.user_point, mu.user_grade, mm.movie_num, mm.movie_title, mr.rate_review FROM m_user mu JOIN m_rate mr ON mu.user_num = mr.user_num JOIN m_movie mm ON mr.movie_num = mm.movie_num where mu.user_Num = #{userNum}

SELECT m_movie.movie_num, m_movie.movie_title, m_img.img_url, m_user.user_num FROM m_movie INNER JOIN m_img ON m_movie.movie_num = m_img.movie_num INNER JOIN m_interest ON m_movie.movie_num = m_interest.movie_num INNER JOIN m_user ON m_user.user_num = m_interest.user_num where m_user.user_num = #{userNum}
select user_id from m_user mu where mu.user_id = 'admin';
